other_tests.findings: Cataracts with bilateral central and peripheral crystalline flecks in a radial pattern, best identified by retroillumination.
A point mutation (c.–160A →G) in the iron-response element of the 5ʹ untranslated region of the FTL gene in all affected family members.
Successful cataract surgery on one eye.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Awaiting surgery for the second eye.
